Topic.Title: [Game Release] Existential Crap About People in Space

Posts.EditableText: Full title: [b:1qhqmv1z]You Need to Stop Writing Existential Crap About People in Space [/b:1qhqmv1z] http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/ ... e-in-space This is my first completed piece of interactive fiction, written as a sort of test for my planned (much longer and more complex game) ACT II. ACT II is also existential crap but it's not about people in space probably. I plan to have that done by the end of the month although I haven't yet decided if I'm going to publish it through quest or not. You can find out more at [url:1qhqmv1z]http://act-ii.tumblr.com[/url:1qhqmv1z]. It's short and goofy but hopefully kind of fun. Let me know what you think.
Posts.HTML:
Full title: You Need to Stop Writing Existential Crap About People in Space

http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/ ... e-in-space

This is my first completed piece of interactive fiction, written as a sort of test for my planned (much longer and more complex game) ACT II. ACT II is also existential crap but it's not about people in space probably. I plan to have that done by the end of the month although I haven't yet decided if I'm going to publish it through quest or not. You can find out more at http://act-ii.tumblr.com.

It's short and goofy but hopefully kind of fun. Let me know what you think.
